Necromancer picks up Razor Claw, "You've seen enough action for today." He =
transforms back to his dragon form to carry the raptor away from the battle=
 only to be struck in the back by mobsters shots. "Looks like the only way =
out of this is through him." 

Necromancer flies into the air carrying Razo=
rclaw in one of his claws. He launches a white fireball at Mobster, followe=
d by a blue one. the blue catches up and causes the white one to explode in=
 a brilliance of blinding light and searing heat. (Little chemistry note- W=
hite and Blue are two of the hottest in the laws of Physics.)
  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thu=
rsday, December 28, 2000 7:02 PM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


  Mobster=
 is charred some, but still doesn't move. He aims at Razorclaw.

  Mobster =
(multiple voices): Doomsday.

  Mobster fires 3 times at Razorclaw...
    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Tuesday, December 26, 2000 8:36 AM
    Subject: Re: Sorry sou=
lstice


    The blast hit Razor Claws shield, it saved him from the power =
of the blast but he'd taxxed it to it's limits. he fell to the ground again=
 spent from the physical exhertion he'd put on himself. He picked himself u=
p again insisting on being destroyed on his feet. Fireballs hit Mobster cau=
sing Razor Claw to look back. Necromancer had arrived in time to save him.
=

    Necromancer saw that he had Mobsters full attention when the giant fir=
ed on him. He transformed to robot mode shrinking down to a smaller target =
to dodge the blast. he rased his rifle and set it on high power. he fired f=
ive blasts at the head of Mobster as he flew down to check the condition of=
 the Raptor he'd just saved.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From=
: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, December 25,=
 2000 10:33 PM
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      Mobster fired aga=
in at Razorclaw...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: CYBE=
RWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Monday, December 25, =
2000 4:01 AM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        Razor Claw rais=
ed to his feat to stubborn to know when to quit. he stepped forward, ready =
for anything the larger bot had to offer. "You ready to surrender yet?" He =
asked sarcastically even though he already knew the answer.
          -----=
 Original Message ----- 
          From: SOULSTICE 
          To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 9:34 PM
          Subj=
ect: Re: Sorry soulstice


          Mobster watched, wondering how Razorcl=
aw felt...and enjoying the thought. Mobster, as cruel as the Mini-Mafia cou=
ld be, waited for Razorclaw to regain his strength and composure, he wanted=
 to knock it out of Razorclaw again...
            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
         Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 3:16 AM
            Subject: Re: S=
orry soulstice


            Razor Claw bounced off Mobster, the impact mad=
e his head spin. The mighty raptor heard Mobster have some smart ass commen=
t toward him. He looked up in time to see Mobster raise his weapon again. R=
azor Claw turned and tried to run and got just far enough to avoid being hi=
t directly by the beam. The weapon still had a devastating effect on him th=
ough as the shrapnel of dirt and pebbles shred at his skin. The blast shot =
him about sixty yards from where he'd started. He landed with an ooof as hi=
s body skipped multiple times across the hard African ground. There he lay =
in pain, trying to regain his strength and composure.
              ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
              From: SOULSTICE 
              To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 1:53 PM
    =
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


              Mobster wobbled some=
, but that was the extent of it. He turned around.

              Mobster (=
Grenade voice): Are you trying to knock me over, little man?

             =
 Mobster fires at Razorclaw once...
                ----- Original Message =
----- 
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
                Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
             =
   Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                A sudden shadow covered R=
azor Claw as Mobsters foot raised above him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turne=
d to run. His energy was low so he didn't want to risk his shield not holdi=
ng. He ran toward Mobster. Mobsters foot struck the ground behind Razor Cla=
w, the impact shook the ground sending Razor claw rolling past the giant ge=
stalt. He rolled to his feat and turned again ready for battle. He dove for=
ward at Mobsters rear end hoping the giant would still be off balance enoug=
h to knock over.
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
          =
        From: SOULSTICE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        =
          Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 10:46 AM
                  Subjec=
t: Re: Sorry soulstice


                  (I normally am against stomping,=
 but...)
                   
                  Mobster raised his foot.

  =
                Mobster (Kracken voice): Over!

                  Mobster b=
rung his foot down towards Razorclaw...
                    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                    From: CYBERWOLF4 
                    To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 1=
2:11 PM
                    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                =
    Razor Claw remained still as a statue, watching the battle rage around =
him. He opened a comm to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available max=
imal, I'm pinned down and need some coverfire."
                      -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                      From: SOULSTICE 
           =
           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Saturday, De=
cember 23, 2000 1:16 PM
                      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice
=


                      Mobster stood still. The raptor would have to move =
sometime.

                      Mobster (Horn Drill voice): He'll have to =
move sometime. Who helped to build this house?

                      Mobst=
er kept his cannon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
            =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: CYB=
ERWOLF4 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  =
      Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
                        Su=
bject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                        Razor Claw knew that t=
here was only one way to survive a blast from a weapon of that size. he tra=
nsformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on his shield. The ground ar=
ound him incinerated on contact. He survived but it was sapping to much of =
his strength. The raptor couldn't move without deactivating his shield.
   =
                       ----- Original Message ----- 
                      =
    From: SOULSTICE 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
                      Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
            =
              Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                          Mobs=
ter took a scratch of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aime=
d his giant cannon at Razorclaw and fired...
                            --=
--- Original Message ----- 
                            From: CYBERWOLF4 
 =
                           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        =
    Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
                            Sub=
ject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                            Razor Claw stood co=
nfused for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and=
 hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked lo=
oking up at the bot he challenged. 
                              ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
                              From: SOULSTICE 
       =
                       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                            =
  Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
                              =
Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                              Gigas didn't m=
ove an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

                 =
             Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, a=
s Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

                              Mobster switches=
 voices.

                              Kracken: But right now, we're Mobst=
er...
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
                         From: CYBERWOLF4 
                                =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Thursday, Dec=
ember 21, 2000 10:15 AM
                                Subject: Re: Sorry =
soulstice


                                Razor Claw looked up at his att=
acker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's make this=
 interesting, you knock me down, I join your alliance, I knock you down, yo=
u surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled his left arm=
 back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
          =
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                       =
         From: SOULSTICE 
                                To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
                                Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 1=
2:18 PM
                                Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    =
                            Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. =
That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In ot=
her words, I am not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me taking=
 the brunt of the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. Y=
ou know, you should join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

  =
                              Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving =
an inch...
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
                              From: CYBERWOLF4 
                           =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Wednesda=
y, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
                                Subject: Sorr=
y soulstice


                                Sorry, it must've been mixxed=
 up in the battle. I found it.

                                claw struck=
 him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by=
 the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he =
again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judg=
ing by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large,=
 Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw=


                                Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas'=
 punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The im=
pact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on h=
is feat. He looked back  at the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I=
 hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an u=
nfair fight".
                                ----- Original Message ----- =

                                From: THECODE 
                           =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesday,=
 December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
                                Subject: Re: thr=
ee on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


           =
                     OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
 =
                               ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
                  From: CYBERWOLF4 
                                To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesday, December 19=
, 2000 10:31 AM
                                Subject: three on one hardl=
y seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


                          =
      Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mis=
took them for escaping alliance members. he mentally reported his actions t=
o Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they were out of the =
way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confro=
nted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

        =
                        He aproached the three bots ready for battle and ho=
ping that things won't be ended peacefully.
                               =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: dachan=
de 
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
               =
                 Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                  =
              Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


                  =
              ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
                               =
  
                                    They had heard the battling and deci=
ded to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritr=
on ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, i=
n beast modes. And headed far away.































        =
eGroups Sponsor
